A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of note durations in seconds.

VariabilityOfNotePrevalenceOfPitchedInstrumentsFeature - Class in jsymbolic2.features
A feature exractor that finds the standard deviation of the fraction of Note Ons played by each (pitched) General MIDI instrument that is used to play at least one note.

vertical_interval_chart - Variable in class jsymbolic2.processing.MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
A chart containing ticks in the first index and MIDI pitches in the second index Each tick corresponds to all 128 possible midi ticks.
vertical_interval_track_chart - Variable in class jsymbolic2.processing.MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
The first index contains the track number of the given sequence.
VerticalDissonanceRatioFeature - Class in jsymbolic2.features
A feature extractor that extracts the total number of vertical 2nds, tritones, 7ths and 9ths divided by the total number of vertical unisons, 4ths, 5ths, 6ths, octaves and 10ths.
VerticalDissonanceRatioFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic2.features.VerticalDissonanceRatioFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.

VibratoPrevalenceFeature - Class in jsymbolic2.features
A feature exractor that finds the number of notes for which Pitch Bend messages change direction at least twice divided by total number of notes that have Pitch Bend messages associated with them.

VoiceEqualityRangeFeature - Class in jsymbolic2.features

VoiceOverlapFeature - Class in jsymbolic2.features
A feature extractor that extracts the number of notes played within the range of another voice divided by total number of notes in the piece overall.
VoiceOverlapFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic2.features.VoiceOverlapFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
VoiceSeparationFeature - Class in jsymbolic2.features
A feature exractor that finds the average separation in semi-tones between the average pitches of consecutive channels (after sorting based on average pitch) that contain at least one note.
VoiceSeparationFeature() - Constructor for class jsymbolic2.features.VoiceSeparationFeature
Basic constructor that sets the definition and dependencies (and their offsets) of this feature.
volumes - Variable in class jsymbolic2.processing.MIDIIntermediateRepresentations
A table with rows (first indice) corresponding to MIDI ticks in the MIDI file.
